item.title: Reversing Packet Tracer a parte: pka2xml-aws
item.description: Table of Contents Backend Installing the C++ Lambda Runtime Setting up CMake The code Compiling Frontend After having finally finished writing a small tool based on the research from part 1 - which can be found here - I decided to distract myself even further and I've decided embark on a new jurney; porting the tool to the aws C++ lambda runtime and create a small frontend to go with it.

item.title: Reversing Packet Tracer Part 1: Network Simulation Files
item.description: Table of Contents Preface Reversing Stage 1: decryptPTSave Stage 2: decipher Stage 3: deobfuscateBytes Stage 4: qUncompress Putting it All Together Resources Preface As a high school IT student I find myself using Packet Tracer almost on a daily basis.
